steps: (Optional) Saute onion and bell pepper in olive oil in Instant Pot on saute mode for 3-4 minutes
Add garlic and tomato paste, cook for 1 minute
Add lentils, sweet potato cubes, crushed tomatoes, broth, and all spices
Cook on high pressure for 10 minutes
Season with salt and pepper to taste
title: Lentil & Sweet Potato Chile
